entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:23 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 04:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: N 25 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
